summary: My ENB based on the wish to satisfy my hunger for a photorealistic, real perception simulating Light-Shadow Cinema-Show. I gave my best based on the work of other créateurs d'enb's & Lights/shadows-Masters...
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52873-4-1397724321.gif[/img][/center]

[center](Sorry for my bad english - my german and russian are much better)[/center]

When my daily work is finished and my wife and my kids sleep I play skyrim. And I always wanted a realistic world to dive in. This is my result after many weeks of tuning.Thanks to all the kind people who worked on their ENB's and mods for the last few years. Now I wanted to share my creation with the community.


[center]PREPARATION[/center]

- Backup your current ENB preset (if you use one) and delete the enb relevant data sets in your skyrim-folder
- Backup your current skyrim.ini and skyrimprefs.ini
- Install wrapper version [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe by Great Grandmaster Boris Vorontsov[/url] in your skyrim-folder
- Install these mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus[/url] BUT JUST EnhancedLightsandFX.esp (Required!) and ELFX - Exteriors.esp (Not necessary - optional)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29253/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D29253%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Remove Interior Fog V2 by rgabriel15[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12454/?]Dark Dungeons for ENB by mindflux[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31545/?]Darkness - Vanilla Lighting Tweaks by curt[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30681/?]Skyrim Contrast Fix by pizdel[/url]

I created the mod using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting - Audio by JJC71[/url] - but I think this mod is optional.
I recolored grass for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul by vurt[/url]. Just optional. You will need the original mod.

[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52873-3-1397724321.gif[/img][/center]

[center]INSTALLATION[/center]

Download my skyrim.ini and skyrimprefs.ini (HIGH fps impact) and install them in "documents/my games/skyrim" OR

SETUP YOUR SKYRIMPREFS.INI
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

Install My ENB in your steam gamefolder "skyrim".

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52873-1-1397723654.gif[/img][/center]

[center]TUNING[/center]

I suggest you open ingame the console and set your field of view to 100 or even 105. Just a suggestion.
console key ^
type: "fov 100" without quotes.

I use letterbox. You can deactivate it in your gamefolder skyrim/enbseries/enbeffect.fx:
Set "Enable Letterbox=false"

My effectprepass.fx tries to simulate the perception of a human eye. If you don't like it take the effectprepass.fx of an other enb you like more. It should work fine.

To reduce the fps impact as much as possible download the optional enbseries.ini and sweetFX_settings.ini AND don't use my skyrim.ini and skyrimprefs.ini!

You can tune the enb to your system with the help of the ingame enb-changer by Boris. (shift and enter)

[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52873-2-1397724320.gif[/img][/center]

[center]BUGS and PROBLEMS[/center]

When I am not willing to play skyrim I will continue my work on this enb. It's not perfect. If you find something strange, too bright or too dark please tell me. Perhaps I will update the files one day.

[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52873-1-1397725572.gif[/img][/center]

[center]PERMISSIONS[/center]
Permissions for the respective files belong to their original authors.


[center]CREDITS[/center]

• Boris Vorontsov
• Alexander Blade
• CeeJay.dk
• ZeroKing
• Kyokushinoyama ( The best sunsprites I've ever seen!)
• MATSO

And a GREAT THANK YOU to prod80. Not just his amazing enbeffect.fx! But his whole [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51343/?]Serenity ENB[/url] inspired me to my preset. Thanks for your permission to use some of your files.

• All the mod authors

P.S.: If I forgot someone or something please tell me and I will correct my failure. Thanks.
author: CandyRay
